resources.string: 网络异常，请检查网络连接！
检测到新版本，立即更新吗

Li-ying zhao, born on October 16, 1987 in langfang city, hebei province, and film and television actress in mainland China. In 2006, due to yahoo search star feng group game championship into show business; That same year, on commercials directed by feng xiaogang in the kneeling clan as a heroine. In 2007, starring in individual first movie "dart line of the peony pavilion". In 2011, in costume dramas "the new princess huanzhu" plays and sunny Know the audience. In 2013, relying on costume dramas "Liu Zhen legend" get more attention. In October 2014, held in 10th golden eagle TV festival Voting activity was selected as the "golden goddess"; In December, with urban love drama "shanshan came" won the fifth national opera festival's most popular on the mainland Actress; Founded in the same year, the sea of medium li-ying zhao studio.
